issue.title: [meta] GUI repo Questions and Feedback
issue.body: This is a thread for general meta questions and feedback regarding this repo

events.body: Should we move the "x86_64 Linux [GOAL: install] [focal] [depends, sanitizers: thread (TSan), no gui]" CI job from Travis to Cirrus to avoid timeouts?
Now we have timeouts on macOS native builds on Travis.

> Now we have timeouts on macOS native builds on Travis.

Fixed in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19495.

@GBKS would like to get a commit stream/activity from this GUI repo on the Bitcoin Design Slack like there is on the Bitcoin Core Community Slack for the Core [repo](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin). The Slack app must have been [installed](https://github.com/integrations/slack/issues/454#issuecomment-373038982) on the bitcoin organization but may not be installed for the bitcoin-core organization. Any of the owners of this GUI repo able to look into installing it so the Bitcoin Design Slack can get notifications on new PRs and Issues opened on this GUI repo?
Should be possible. All that is needed is the details that need to go into https://github.com/ owner / repo /settings/hooks/new

I think the next required step is an owner of this repo signs up to the Bitcoin Design [Slack](http://www.bitcoindesigners.org/), goes to the `bitcoin-core-gui-pr-review` channel and then inputs `/github subscribe bitcoin-core/gui` in that Slack channel.
That or an owner of this repo tries https://bitcoindesign.slack.com/ as the payload URL on that Add web hook page and application/json for the Content type
Yeah works. Thanks @MarcoFalke! We'll keep this Issue open for further meta questions and feedback

> Yeah works. Thanks @MarcoFalke! We'll keep this Issue open for further meta questions and feedback

Could merging notifications be excluded as they mostly are non-GUI ?
Details are available in https://bitcoindesign.slack.com/ discussion.
@MarcoFalke Is it possible to receive "rebase needed" notifications for pulls in this repo? (e.g., #20)
@MarcoFalke May I ask for adding "Linux" and "Tests" labels to the repo?

> May I ask for adding "Linux" and "Tests" labels to the repo?

Added
Closing for now. If there are any new issues, please open a new issue.
